text: John Devine (born November 2, 1985 in Dixon, Illinois) is an American professional road bicycle racer. ==Major results== * Ronde de l'Isard d'Ariège - 1 stage & Overall (2007) * Volta Provincia Tarragona - 1 stage & Overall (2007) == External links == * VELOBIOS Rider Profile * * Pezcyclingnews interview of John Devine by Matt Wood Category:American male cyclists Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dixon, Illinois
title: John Devine (cyclist)
